components.name: hero
components.heading: Transform your lending and scoring with Open Banking
components.description: Discover new opportunities for your lending business and see how Open Banking can transform your current processes.

tiles.heading: Identity verification
tiles.description:
Identity verification through physical documentation is preventing lenders from offering digital services. With Open
Banking, customer onboarding and processes like KYC and AML are digitised and becoming faster and more efficient.

tiles.heading: Better and faster credit decisions
tiles.description:
Achieve higher acceptance rates and fewer bad loans, harnessing Open Banking data. Quickly and easily integrate our
platform into your current processes.

tiles.heading: Income verification
tiles.description:
Identify income from various sources, not only those that get paid monthly and eliminate the need to supply documentary
evidence, but also enhance KYC/AML.

tiles.heading: Liabilities verification
tiles.description:
Verify current liabilities and identify others that cannot be found in credit bureaus reports, enhancing your customer's
360Â° view and your KYC process.

components.name: imageText
components.headline: _ Data aggregation
components.heading: A unified Open Banking API
components.html: Open Banking (PSD2) is new and immature and requires effort to connect to different banks and different APIs, as each bank has implemented its own version of the specification. Instead of spending months to connect to each bank and a life keeping up to inevitable changes, you can use our unified Open Banking API to connect to all banks and grow with us. Our API already gives life to our solutions but can also support yours. Use the form below to connect with us.

components.name: contact
components.heading: What is your use case with Open Banking?
components.description: We are here to help you put it all together.
